title: Amends the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages
summary: Amends the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages; changes the time from Sunday from four ante meridiem to two ante meridiem; further changes the time from four ante meridiem to two ante meridiem on any other day but Sunday.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          180

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CAHILL -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Economic Development, Job Creation, Commerce and Industry

       AN  ACT  to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the
         sale of alcoholic beverages on certain days

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraphs (a) and (b) of subdivision 5 of section 106 of
    2  the alcoholic beverage control law, as amended by chapter 83 of the laws
    3  of 1995, are amended to read as follows:
    4    (a) Sunday, from [four] TWO ante meridiem to twelve noon.
    5    (b) On any other day between [four] TWO ante meridiem and  eight  ante
    6  meridiem.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01165-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to the sale of alcoholic beverages on certain days
